text: Florence Nightingale Graham (31 December 1884 â€“ 18 October 1966), better known as Elizabeth Arden, was a Canadian-American business woman who founded what is now known as Elizabeth Arden, Incorporated. She built a cosmetics network in the United States. At the peak of her career, she became one of the richest women in the world. She was born near to Woodbridge in the Province of Ontario. title: Elizabeth Arden
